attributes.action: Make disability benefits easier to get for the people that really need them
attributes.additional_details: I personally have found it difficult to apply and have been rejected a numerous of times despite struggling every day with pain and fatigue
attributes.background: I would like the government to look at making applying for disability payments easier for the people that really need them

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like to make it easier for people to apply and be granted disability allowance, but we are not sure which specific benefits you would like there to be changes to. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what process or benefits you would like the Government or Parliament to make changes to.

We currently have the below two petitions open on a similar topic which you might like to sign:

End reviews of PIP and ESA awards for people with lifelong illnesses
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593296

Reform PIP rules and create a dedicated fund to support cancer patients
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597075
